title: The Death of Saul
summary: Saul dies in battle against the Philistines. His sons are also killed, and his body is hung on a wall in disgrace. The chapter explains that Saulâ€™s unfaithfulness to God, especially consulting a medium, led to his downfall.

faq.question: How did Saul die?
faq.answer: He was wounded in battle and took his own life.

faq.question: Why did God reject Saul?
faq.answer: Because of his disobedience, including seeking guidance from a medium.
